name: Ortlieb Velo Shopper Pannier
description: Whether you're riding to the store or to work, this pannier has enough room for your clothing or purchases. It's easy to load an armful of groceries, thanks to the stiffened structure and easy-to-open magnetic buckle, and the waterproof fabric and large lid keep your gear dry on wet days.PU-coated nylon is completely waterproof.IP53 waterproof rating is good for rainy weather.QL2.1 fixing system is easy to install and remove.Fixing system adjusts to fit 16, 12, 10 and 8mm diameter tubes.Magnetic Fidlock closure opens and close with one hand.Inner stiffener and stable feet keep bag upright on flat surfaces.Removable padded shoulder strap.3M Scotchlite reflective patches keep you visible.Edge protector prevent premature wear.Max load is 9kg.
